bio: Alex Shatalin is the JetBrains MPS project lead. Before joining JetBrains MPS one year ago, Alex worked as a principal engineer at the Borland Together modeling department, participating in Borland DSL toolkit design and development, open source Eclipse Graphical Modeling Framework development, and in various other MDA/DSL-based application development projects.

Geertjan Wielenga is a Principal Product Manager at Oracle and works for the NetBeans team, providing documentation & training relating to the NetBeans Platform. He is the co-author of several books and has a popular blog at http://blogs.sun.com/geertjan.

Aslak Knutsen is currently a Senior Software Engineer for the JBoss Seam team at Red Hat, Inc. where he is the project lead for Arquillian and works on projects such as ShrinkWrap, Weld and Seam 3. Previously, Aslak was a Senior Consultant at Conduct AS (working with JBoss related technologies) and Senior Developer at EDB ASA (working with electronic billing/banking systems).

talks.title: Java enterprise testing made easy with Arquillian

bio: Vadim Gurov is a senior software developer at JetBrains and the YouTrack project lead. He holds a PhD in Computer Science and has over ten years of web application development experience. Vadim believes that language-oriented programming is the next big thing in software industry, and works in touch with the MPS team to create DSLs for database and web development.
